Html:
Is anyone else getting this?

I created a recaptcha account and put my public and private key in the config file but the recapthca control does not show up on the Submit New Story page.  When I try to submit a story I get the "Captcha challenge cannot be blank" validation error.

I'm running the app locally using Visual Studio just to check out the code so I don't have it published to a server anywhere.  Any one that has any ideas let me know.
